cz.cvut.fel.archval.core.api
Class ArchVal

java.lang.Object
  cz.cvut.fel.archval.core.api.ArchVal

public class ArchVal
extends java.lang.Object

This class serves as facade to all Archval functionality.

Author:
Martin Vejmelka (martin.vejmelka@fel.cvut.cz)

Constructor Detail

ArchVal

public ArchVal(GraphGeneratorsRegisterIface graphGeneratorsRegister,
               OperatorsRegisterIface operatorsRegister,
               AnalysesRegisterIface analysesRegister)
ArchVal facade constructor. May be freely used to construct this libary instances.

Parameters:
graphGeneratorsRegister - integration interface providing access to existing graph generators
operatorsRegister - integration interface providing access to existing operators in the system
analysesRegister - integration interface providing access to existing analyses in the system
Method Detail

getGraphModelGenerator

public GraphModelGeneratorIface getGraphModelGenerator()
Returns GraphModelGenerator instance which can be used for new GraphModel generation.

Returns:
GraphModelGenerator instance singleton

getValidationModelGenerator

public ValidationModelGeneratorIface getValidationModelGenerator()
Returns ValidationModelGenerator which can be used to generate validation model from AVD files.

Returns:
ValidationModelGenerator instance singleton

createValidationTask

public ValidationTaskIface createValidationTask(GraphModel graphModel,
                                                ValidationModelIface validationModel)
Factory method. Provides new validation task, which can be run on existing GraphModel and ValidationModel.

Parameters:
graphModel - graph model to be validatd
validationModel - validation model to be used for validation
Returns:
ValidationTask instance which can be stared and run
